structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.catch_line: Applicability of KRS 68.245, 132.010, and 132.017 to charter county ad valorem tax rates.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 68.245, 132.010, and 132.017 shall apply to ad valorem tax rates levied by charter county governments.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2010.
